name: Estate Sacrifice
description:
Building a city isn't cheap! Make economies by sacrificing structures to your building while still making them tall enough and standing...

Game made for the Mini Jam 110 : Sacrifice

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-110-sacrifice

Play directly on your browser in  full screen with your mouse:

  • Hold right Click to rotate
  • Left click to destroy a structure

For mobile:

  • 1 finger = click (destroy structure)
  • 2 fingers = hold to rotate
Have fun building your city and keep an eye on your budget!

3D assets from:

https://www.kenney.nl/

Music & sounds from:

https://www.zapsplat.com/
